column1: A funeral service will be conducted at 11:00 AM
column4: 2015 at the Scottsville Independent Baptist Church by Pastor Chauncey Starkey. Interment will follow in the church cemetery. A meal and time of fellowship with the family will follow in the church fellowship hall.     The family will receive friends from 6:00 until 8:00 PM
column7: 2015 at Thacker Brothers Scottsville Funeral Home.
